评论详情: This shirt is snug I guess, but definitely not the same material as the picture. This product is very misleading and shouldn’t even be sold. It is very itchy, smells of rubber latex like a halloween mask, and is visibly dirty. I didn’t even realize that the product shown in the picture had a lace camisole, and the one lazily attached to the shirt is nothing even remotely similar to the image. It is wonky and does not sit right. I will be returning this item.

I used them to tighten the shirt up a bit so that's a win on my end.  The material is very soft and comfortable, but the chain came off while I was trying it on for the first time. Easily fixed if you put the chain on the safety pin the shirt includes, unless you rather take it off which you could also do.  Came with a weird smell, I'll have to wash it and see if it stays put afterwards. If it does then I'll give it 5 stars.
